TopicTitle: Need help landing a Launcher on the moon

Articles.Content: Im trying to put a Launcher on the moon with the Extra planetary Launchpads mod. I cant get anything to land on the moon. Could someone help out with this. Thanks in advance.

Apart from HyperEdit you could try a large, wide design, so it won't flip over. As you are using mods and would probably have Flight Engineer, MechJeb or another sort of info mod, you should make sure that you have 7000+ Delta-V, according to this [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25360-Delta-V-map] map the bare minimum delta-v required is 6210, you should always have an excess of that. Use the large landing gear and read some of the really helpful guides on how to land, basically have 100 m/s for every 1,000 meters above ground level, I think. There are some designs that could give you inspiration, particulary ones used to land large bases on other planets/moons.

Hope this helps
